item.description: Biography Hello! This is Mengqi Peng. Currently, I am a PhD student in HKU, my advisor is Dr. Li-Yi Wei. I received my bachelor degree from SYSU (Sun Yat-sen University) in 2015. You can find my cv here.

item.title: Experience
item.description: I like to experience various working cultures with different cool guys: Sep/2017-Dec/2017 Research Intern at Adobe Research (Seattle) June/2015-August/2015 R&D Summer Intern at ZWCAD Software July/2014-August/2014 Research Summer Intern at HKU

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I am a teaching assistant for the following courses at HKU: Spring 2018 CS-2396: Object-Oriented Programming and Java Autumn 2016 CS-3314: Machine Learning Autumn 2015 CS-1117: Computer Programming

item.title: Honors
item.description: 2019 Google GHC Travel Grant (Houston) 2019 HKU Conference Travel Grant (Vancouver) 2015-2019 HKU Postgraduate Scholarship 2015 Outstanding Undergraduate, Sun Yat-sen University 2014 First Prize, Mathematical Contest in Modeling 2014 Google Anita Borg Scholarship 2011-2014 First class scholarship, Sun Yat-sen University

item.title: Personal
item.description: During my spare time, I have board interests on many cool and fun stuff: Basketball, Tennis, Running, and Hiking Photography Reading, Documentary Films, Movies Calligraphy Pop Music and Fingerstyle

item.title: Multi-swarm Particle Swarm Optimization with Multiple Learning Strategies
